title: "Popularity Model"
output: pdf_document
date: '2022-04-30'
---

```{r}
genre <- read.csv("~/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/SPRING2022/DATA498A/DATA498/train.csv")

# histograms of variables
numeric <- genre[,!names(genre) %in% c('Artist.Name', 'Track.Name', 'Class', 'Mode')]
pop_lm <- lm(Popularity~., numeric)
summary(pop_lm)

# based on significant variables
pop_reduced <- lm(Popularity~danceability+energy+loudness+speechiness+acousticness+instrumentalness+liveness+valence+duration_in.min.ms+time_signature, numeric)
summary(pop_reduced)

plot(genre$danceability, genre$Popularity, xlab = "Danceability", ylab = "Popularity")
plot(genre$energy, genre$Popularity, xlab = "Energy", ylab = "Popularity")
```
